page.title: 01Introduction
page.content: This area covers the south-east suburbs of Edinburgh and the "green belt"area that lies to the south of it.It includes the former village of Gilmerton which is now conservation area within Edinburgh's boundary.The housing is mostly council housing in the form of semi-detached houses and low rise flats dating from the{195Os {and 6Os.} The countryside beyond is gently rolling and is used for arable farming,especially cereals but also dairying and market gardening. {Coal minning}was formerly important but the only site presently worked is a small open-cast one.{Sand and gravel are quarried near by. An industrial estate on the north edge of Loanhead occupies the S.E of the block.
